column2: ENGLISH
The Embrace of Uncle Nurgle

The Plague Father, Fly Lord, Great Corruptor, the Master of Pestilence... Grandfather Nurgle has many titles. Within your very mind and soul you hear the maddened buzzing of a billion flies, and a chorus of choking, coughing voices whispering in your ears. They are calling you to join them in the endless bliss of utter pestilence and decay, to cast aside the facade of health and embrace the utter rottenness that is the inevitable fate of all life.
Father Nurgle loves his childern, he he he...
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] will give me the strength to resist this sickness in my heart!
The Seductions of the Prince of Pleasure

Truth, beauty,, honour, justice... what do any of these things mean without pleasure? Are not the senses of Man his guide into the divine? Poetry, music, dance, wine, none of it is enough for one of your intellect and needs. Your body and mind yearn for stimulation, to seek out new experiences. You tire of the restraints of so-called "civilised society," and wonder if it might be better to seek out likeminded spirits and experiment with a new lifestyle beyond mere mortal hedonism? Your inquiring mind and almost uncontrollable lust for life leads you to the Forbidden Lord of Excess, Slaanesh, who can offer you all you desire in return for so littleâ€¦?
Ah, what sweet ecstasy is thisâ€¦ I must have more!
No, no, I have gone too far... [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] forgive me.
The Changer of Ways Calls Ye

The ignorant masses cling to their Gods and laws, unaware of their own utter insignificance in the grand scheme of things. Civilisations and races rise and fall, the only constant is change - all else is illusion. One of your genius knows that the only way to survive and achieve greatness on this mortal coil is to understand the vast immaterial power of magic, and to use any means necessary to acquire that knowledge. You know that the parlour tricks of the common wizard are merely a pale reflection of the incredible powers that close-minded religious dogma denies to you. In order to better understand the Winds of Magic, and to further your own career, you've considered entering a purely temporary relationship with the demonic called Tzeentch in order to use him for your own ends.
Knowlegde is power.
Some secerts must be forever hidden.
The Eight-Fold Path

Weakness, all you see around you is weakness and corruption. Peace breeds excess, only war is pure. Every day you spend you long for the clash of arms, the splatter of fresh blood on your face, to see your enemies homesteads in flames and their warriors in flight. Better that than to forever be surrounded by whining, ungrateful vassals and forced to listen to the false advice of effete scholars and sorcerers. Kill them, kill them all! Khrone, Master of the Skull Throne, calls you to his service. It matters not from whence the blood flows, only that it does.
BLOOD FOR THE BLOOD GOD, SKULLS FOR THE SKULL THRONE!!!
What am I thinking?! I'm a warrior, not a butcher!
The Power of Chaos

Everywhere those in power seek to blind the teaming mass of humanity to the horrors that lurk just out of sight. The Blood God, the Changer of Ways, the Prince of Pleasure and the Great Corrupter are all names for a unspeakable force that was ancient when the mountains and the seas were young. Fools deny it, but the Runinous Powers are very real. Those who serve them well are rewarded, or else are damned for eternity. Do you dare sell your soul to Chaos Undivided, the Primordial Annihilator - and risk all for the sake of immortality and a escape from death itself?
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]? Bah, these are the real Gods!
My faith in [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] in unshakeable!
The Cult

You hurry through the streets, scurrying like a common criminal through the backstreets and the slums, a hood obscuring your face from sight. But you are no common thief or mere conspirator, you serve a greater power. You duck and weave your way to arranged meeting place, whispering a password in a forbidden language. Inside, you are greeted by your new Brothers and Sisters, and after a blood curdling ritual test you are finally inaugurated into the Cult.
It's too late to turn back now....
You were infected with Tomb Rot, and your body has started rotting.
Oh no!
A miracle! You were cured of Tomb Rot.
Bless the Gods!.
A miracle! You were cured of Creeping Buboes.
Bless the Gods!.
A miracle! You were cured of Green Pox.
Bless the Gods!.
A miracle! You were cured of Red Pox.
Bless the Gods!.
A miracle! You were cured of Rattlelung.
Bless the Gods!.
A miracle! You were cured of Bone Auge.
Bless the Gods!.
Hidden
You have been blessed with a long life, but now you feel your time has come to leave this world.
I die in peace..
Illness weakens your once strong body, you feel that your last moment has come. You take your final breath.
Aaaaaa...
Signs of Armageddon
The Signs on heaven and earth are telling about forecoming Armageddon. Mutants attacks are more frequent and people are telling stories about strange ilnesses that depopulated whole villages...
Yes indeed something is happening...
The Unholy crusade has begun! The world will tremble! The believers of false gods will be sink in their blood!!
For glory!
The Armies of Chaos march through the world spreading destruction in the name of their Dark Gods. The Doom is coming... In such conflict One must take a side..
LET THE WORLD BURN!.
I will never yield before Chaos.
That is not our war...

Signs in the heavens and on earth tell of imminent coming of the End of Days. Mutations and Beastmen attacks are more frequent and you hear stories about strange illnesses that completely wipe out whole villages.
It is clear something is happening...
The [From.GetTitledFirstName] beg for your help against the armies of Chaos. What is your answer?
In this dark hour we will stand up to the challenge!.
This war isn't ours to fight.
Your mighty host entered the lands of infidels they are not the target of black crusade however Gods would be pleased if their blood would cover the land...
Drown them in their own blood! Pillage and burn in the name of Gods!
Their time will come... Try to pass unnoticed.
Armies of Chaos are marching. The host of [From.GetTitledFirstName] is ravagaing yor lands. What will you do?
Let them pass.
You failed to cast the spell.
You were unable to control magic winds, chaotic streams of magic left you burn and scarred.
Terrible mistake during spellcasting exposed you to the power of Ruinous Powers, you scream from pain when raw magical energies twist and damage your body.
Across the field of battle you have spotted an enemy worth facing.
Who shall I fight today?
As you draw closer you see your enemy is [From.GetTitledName]. Shall you engage [From.GetHerHim]?
I shall defeat [From.GetHerHim]!
The enemy reacts!
Discretion is the better part of valour!
The battle is not yet won... How will you proceed?
Attack Enemy
Cast Spell
Counterspell or Channel Magic Power
Focus On The Other Aspects of Magic
Try to escape!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] managed to escape the battlefield, shaming [From.GetHerHim]self forever!
The coward has escaped... for now.
You slash at [FromFrom.GetFirstName] and manage to wound [FromFrom.GetHerHim], however your attack left you open to [FromFrom.GetHerHis] counter attack. How will you respond?
Focus on defence. Let no attack through!
Focus on offence. Attack without restraint!
Balance your defence and offence. Overcompensation will lead to ruin!

column1: # THOSE OPTIONS ARE FOR ALL EVENTS 20-23

column2: Cast Offensive Spell
Cast Defensive Spell
Cast Buff Spell
Cast Lore Special Spell
Channel Magic Power
Perform Counterspell
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] sends a wild attack your way, but you are able to brush it aside and counter attack wounding [FromFrom.GetHerHim]. How will you respond?
You attack [FromFrom.GetFirstName] but are unable to penetrate [FromFrom.GetHerHis] defences, and [FromFrom.GetSheHe] responds with a vicious counter that leaves you wounded. How will you respond?
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] blocks every blow you send [FromFrom.GetHerHis] way, but you manage to do same. How will you respond?
Unable to continue, you succumb to your wounds...
Avenge me!
You have won! The body of [From.GetTitledName] lies before you.
Hurray!
You have lost the battle... Wounded and weak you managed to escape...
Run!
You have won! However [From.GetTitledName] has managed to escape!
A coward through and through!

Hide My Cultist
You have successfully cast the spell Burning Gaze. Your gaze focuses radiant power on the enemy, wounding and perhaps dazing them as well.
You have successfully cast the spell Body of Light. Your body shines with an intensely bright light, making you difficult to look upon. Your enemy will have difficulty attacking you.
You have successfully cast the spell Healing Energy. Light fills your wounds, healing them and bringing you back into the fight

You have successfully cast the spell Radiant Weapon. You infuse your weapon with the radiant energy of Hysh. It now glows with a pure white light, allowing you attack more effectively and doing additional damage against deamons.

column1: # SYLVANIA EVENTS I DONT KNOW IF THOSE ARE CORRECT

column2: Sylvania is a dangerous place for all live, but a lovely country if you are a Vampire.
I'll rule on this accursed land.
I've found my perfect lair.
My lands are suffering the effects of dark forces. Dead men arise while huge flocks of bats darkened the skies.
Damn. I can't do anything to stop it.
With my efforts, the lands of Sylvania are growing up again. Crops grow and people live safely under my rule.
I'm a great ruler.
With my powerful magic, Sylvania is getting stronger. The dead will rise again and more serfs will come to me.
I will live for eternity.
I've not paid enough attention to the care of my land, and now, my loyal servants leave, pursued by hunters and templars.
I don't care of mortal affairs.
I've conquered the land, and now I will increase my armies with the dead's bodies, and local necromancers.
I'm unstoppable.
I've conquered the land, and now I have to face down armies of dead and vampire servants.
I shall prevail.
Send money to a loyal sigmarite to fight undead.
Send the money.
Don't send the money.
Great Theogonist [From.GetFirstName] has send us money to fight undead.
I'll waste it well.
What will I do with the money Great Theogonist sent me?
Hire some adventurers.
I'll lead a hunting party.
I'll keep the money for me.
A strange hooded man approaches you, offering you his services to fight the dangers of sylvania.
Let him in, as he will serve me well.
I don't trust strangers, send him far away.
He's a witch! Burn him! Buuurn hiiiiim!
There is a chance that the man escapes, wounding you in gratitude for your hospitality.
